When dealing with sign language recognition, we use official informations coming from [the French sign language alphabet](http://www.langage-des-signes.com/index.html).

- [alphabet](http://www.langage-des-signes.com/alphabet-langue-des-signes.html)
- [signer son nom](http://www.langage-des-signes.com/signer-son-nom.html)
- [formation des signes en LSF](http://www.langage-des-signes.com/formation-des-signes.html)
- [grammaire](http://www.langage-des-signes.com/grammaire-langue-des-signes.html)
- [quelques mots](http://www.langage-des-signes.com/exemples-mots-signes.html)
- [les phrases](http://www.langage-des-signes.com/phrase-langue-des-signes.html)
- [le language](http://www.langage-des-signes.com/langage-des-signes.html)
